name: London Heist
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Four men. Four million in cash. One final job. But their haul is stolen and one of their fathers, is murdered. Forced to flee the country after an attempt on his life, Cregan's hiding out in sunny Spain when he meets his father's beautiful contact, who suggests the man's murder wasn't about money.
about_the_game: Four men. Four million in cash. One final job. But their haul is stolen and one of their fathers, is murdered. Forced to flee the country after an attempt on his life, Cregan's hiding out in sunny Spain when he meets his father's beautiful contact, who suggests the man's murder wasn't about money.
short_description: A bank heist goes bad and someone is murdered, but things may not be all they seem.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
